    • Constructor Detail

      • Beverage

        public Beverage(double weight,
                int volume)
        Initializes a new beverage of a given weight and volume. Both must be greater than zero.
        Parameters:
        weight - the weight of the beverage.
        volume - the volume of the beverage.
